flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=130>>130 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 130 + 35 = <<130+35=160>>160 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 160 - 15 = 145 books
#### 145

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 165, not 160. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
